title: Twitter under fire for reinstating account that posted child sex abuse
description: Twitter reinstated the account after some of its more than 500,000 followers complained that the account had been suspended for its political messaging.

title: New research suggests social media doesn’t fuel political polarization
description: As part of the project, researchers altered the feeds of thousands of people using Facebook and Instagram to see if that would change political beliefs.

title: Sen. Cantwell readies alternative plan to tackle TikTok concerns
description: Sen. Maria Cantwell is readying alternative legislation to tackle concerns posed by apps like TikTok.

title: E.U. antitrust investigation into Microsoft Office, Teams tie-up
description: The European Union's competition enforcement body is investigating whether bundling the two products together presents an antitrust concern.

title: Top résumé tips to stand out in automated screenings and with recruiters
description: Job recruiters share advice to help applicants increase the chance of landing the job, even as more tech is used in the process.
